overview.title: What is Nightreign?
overview.content: Nightreign is an expansive action-RPG addition to the Elden Ring universe. Developed by FromSoftware, Nightreign explores a dark parallel world filled with new lore, terrifying bosses, and a unique 3-day roguelike-style survival structure. In Nightreign, players assume the role of "Nightfarers," battling against chaos to restore balance.

release.title: Nightreign Release Date and Platforms
release.content: Nightreign launches globally on May 30, 2025. It will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and also supports co-op gameplay for up to three players. Keep an eye out for updates and downloadable expansions as Nightreign evolves post-launch.

characters.title: Nightreign Character Classes
characters.content: There are eight predefined classes in Nightreign, each with unique strengths and skills. Whether you prefer magic, melee, or support roles, Nightreign offers flexible playstyles. Discover the best class combinations for survival in the ever-changing dungeons of Nightreign.

bosses.title: Nightreign Boss Battles & Walkthroughs
bosses.content: Face legendary enemies like the Blue Flame Dragon and King of Thorns. Our detailed Nightreign boss strategies help you understand enemy behavior, weak points, and provide step-by-step combat guides to help you conquer every battle in Nightreign.

questions.q: Do I need to play Elden Ring first?
questions.a: No, Nightreign is a standalone story accessible to all players.
No, Nightreign supports co-op mode with up to 3 players.
The main campaign of Nightreign is around 25 hours with over 60 hours for full completion.
